name: You Are Broke!
description:
This was made in one week for a PSP gamejam, the 2020 Awakening Game Jam.

Engine used was Integrity Engine, a custom written from the ground up game engine mainly targeting the Sega Dreamcast and Sony PSP, and also Windows and Linux.

The main game play wasn't able to be created in a week. But the engine was massively improved and lots of new backend features were created. The largest new feature being using blender as a level editor and then getting better support for models and 3d in general.
